text:
I stayed here for one week with my two teenage sons who were attending a convention at the Austin convention center.
It was an easy 10 minute walk to the Convention center from the condo. We rented a car but found we didn't really need it so much because there are many restaurants and activities within walking distance.
The condo was very clean and comfortable.
In addition to the bedroom, there is a futon and sofa available for sleeping with bedding supplied...The bed was comfortable, futon and sofa were adequate.
Sue was a very kind and gracious host who made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed...she even left us some snacks and a nice selection of local beers.
Overall we were very satisfied with the experience and would stay here again.
title: Chic downtown 6th St. Condo
